notes.title: Data availability
notes.p: The datasets generated during and/or analyzed during the current study are available from the corresponding author on reasonable request. Raw sequencing data have been deposited at NCBI under SRA accession number PRJNA561259. The Transcriptome Shotgun Assembly project has been deposited at DDBJ/EMBL/GenBank under the accession GJAG00000000. The version described in this paper is the first version, GJAG01000000.
